'''Fine Enhancement Ore''' is an Enhancement Material for [[Weapon]]s that provides 2,000 [[Weapon EXP]].

==How to Obtain==
===Forging===
Two different recipes are available to forge Fine Enhancement Ore.

====White Iron Recipe====
The following recipe yields 1 Fine Enhancement Ore and up to 20 stacks can be ordered per forge queue slot. It shares the daily 300,000 [[Weapon EXP|Weapon Experience]] forging cap with [[Enhancement Ore]] and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]].
{{Recipe
|type = Forging
|time = 6s
|Mora = 10
|White Iron Chunk = 3
|sort = White Iron Chunk;Mora
}}

====Starsilver Recipe====
The following recipe yields 1 Fine Enhancement Ore and up to 20 stacks can be ordered per forge queue slot. It shares the daily 300,000 [[Weapon EXP|Weapon Experience]] forging cap with [[Enhancement Ore]] and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]].
{{Recipe
|type = Forging
|time = 6s
|Starsilver = 3
|Mora = 10
|sort = Starsilver;Mora
}}
